messageValues.message: =Create an engaging podcast script based on the following content. The script should be exactly 5-7 minutes when read aloud (approximately 750-1000 words).  CONTENT TO DISCUSS: {content}  STYLE: {style}  PODCAST SCRIPT REQUIREMENTS: 1. Start with: "Welcome to our AI-generated podcast. Today we're diving into..." 2. Structure: Introduction, 2-3 main discussion points, conclusion 3. Use natural conversational language 4. Include smooth transitions between topics 5. Add brief pauses with periods and commas for natural speech 6. Avoid complex punctuation that might confuse TTS 7. End with: "Thanks for listening! This has been your AI podcast." 8. Write ONLY the spoken content (no stage directions) 9. Keep sentences moderate length for clear speech 10. Use engaging storytelling techniques

## üéØ Main Template Overview
What this workflow does:
- Extracts text from uploaded PDF files
- Generates conversational podcast script using AI
- Converts script to natural-sounding audio
- Saves final podcast as WAV file

Setup required:
- Google Gemini API key (for AI script generation)
- Google PaLM API credentials (for TTS)
- File upload capability

## üîß Setup Instructions
Before You Start:

Get API Keys:
- Gemini API: https://aistudio.google.com/
- Add to n8n credentials as "Google Gemini(PaLM) Api account"


Test the workflow:
- Use the manual trigger
- Upload a PDF file
- Check that audio file is generated
